items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position.
Jump to the right, landing on your right foot with your left foot behind your right ankle.
Swing your left arm across your body and your right arm behind your back.
Jump to the left, landing on your left foot with your right foot behind your left ankle.
Swing your right arm across your body and your left arm behind your back.
Repeat the movement, jumping back and forth between your right and left foot.
Continue for the desired number of repetitions or time.
Strengthens leg muscles, particularly the glutes, quads, and hamstrings
Can be done anywhere with a flat surface
Low impact exercise, reducing risk of injury
